about_the_game:
Soundtrack and Concept Art from the eight monster girls from Fiend Heart.

What includes this package


  • Original Sound Track - All the musics I composed for the game are included.
  • Concept Art - See how some characters looked before the final game.
  • Artist's Notes - Discover a few silly facts about the monster girls and the castle.

One last note:


Everything included in this pack can be unlocked by just finishing the game once. But.... If you still wanna buy it and support my work, I will be forever grateful.'

How to access this content:


Go to the game install directory which you can access through:
Fiend Heart >>> Properties >>> Browse Local Files.
